Media & Press Kit

Resources for journalists, media professionals, and content creators covering men's health and lifestyle medicine topics.

Press Kit

Short Bio

Dr Adrian Laurence is a New Zealand GP with 17+ years experience and an accredited lifestyle medicine doctor. He specializes in helping men over 35 optimize their health through evidence-based strategies focusing on sleep, nutrition, exercise, and stress management.

Long Bio

Dr Adrian Laurence is a New Zealand GP with over 17 years of clinical experience and an accredited lifestyle medicine doctor through the Australasian Society of Lifestyle Medicine. He holds an MBChB from the University of Otago and is a Fellow of the Royal New Zealand College of General Practitioners.

Talking Points

Key Messages

  • • Evidence-based lifestyle medicine for men over 35
  • • Practical strategies without extremes
  • • Education-focused approach
  • • Sustainable health habits
  • • Men's health specialization

Expertise Areas

  • • Sleep optimization and recovery
  • • Protein and nutrition for aging
  • • Exercise prescription for busy schedules
  • • Stress management and resilience
  • • Behavior change and habit formation
